00-0011 Mona Lisa

Item with a variable price option. The hidden variable "sku" contains the keyword "mod1" instead of a price. This tells the cart to parse the selection named "mod1" to obtain the item price. Notice that the select box has a quality and price separated by a space dash space. You must use this format to insure correct parsing. Up to 16 options mod1 - mod16 can be used to price an item.

99-102 The Art Store T-Shirt

Pre-washed
(add $2.00)

Item with a multiple price options. The first one sets the base price, and additional options add to the price.
